title: JSON Schema for my JSON file format

From.description: Config to be passed when calling Packager.Package() method.

RootPath.description: Root path, should support msbuild macros e.g. $(ProjectDir)

EntryPoints.description: Array of entry files that needs to be bundled.

CopyFiles.description: Array of entry files that needs to be copied.

Into.description: config to be passed while calling PackageCompiler.Compile() method

Directory.description: Directory where packaged files need to be copied

DI.description: Dependency Injection registrations, allows to replace default implementations

.*.description: Interface -> Implementation map with fully qualified class names

items.description: Fully qualified name class names that implements IFileHandler interface
